title: vAraNam Ayiram
sahitya:
(rAgA:  husEni)   


vAraNam Ayiram.  rAgamAlikA.   tALA:  tisram.    
P:  vAraNam Ayiram shUzha valam sheidu nAraNa nambi naDakkinrAe ennedir 
pUraNa porkkuDam vaittup-puramengum tOraNam nATTakkanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
nALaivaduvai maNamenru nALiTTu pALaimughu parishuDaip-pandark-kIzh
kOLiri mAdhvan gOvindanenbAnOr kALai pughudakkanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
indiranuLLiTTa dEvar kuzhAmellAm vandirundennai maghaT-pEshi mantirittu 
mantirak-koDiyuDutti maNamAlai andari shUTTakkanAkkaNDEn tOzhi nAn
nATrishai tIrtham koNarndu nani nalghi pArppanar shiTTargaL pallAreDuttEtti
pUppunai kaNNip-punitanODenrennai kAppu Nan kaTTakkanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
kadiroLi dIpam kalshamuDanEndi sadir iLa mangaiyar tAm vandedir koLLa 
maduraiyAr mannanaDi nilait-toTTengum adirap-pughudakkanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
maddaLam koTTa vari shankham ninrUda muttuDaittAmam nirai tAzhnda pandark-kIzh
maittunan nambi madhusUdan vandennaik-kaittalam paTrak-kanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
vAi nallAr nalla marai Odi mantirattAl pAshilai nANal paDuttup-padari vaittu 
kAiccina mAkaLirannAnen kaip-paTri tIvalam sheyyak-kanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
immaikkum EzhEzh piravikkum paTrAvAn nammaiyuDaiyavan nArAyaNan nambi
shemmaiyuDaiyat-tiruk-kaiyyAl tAL paTri ammi midikkak-kanAkk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
varishilai vAL mukhat-tenrnai mAr tAm vandiTTu erimukham pArit-tennai munnE nirutti 
arimukhan accutan kaim-mElan kai vaittu pori mukham taTTak-kanAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
kumkumamappik-kuLir shAntamaTTittu mangala vIdi valam sheidu maNa nIr
angavanODum uDan shenrangAnai mEl manjananAk-kaNDEn tOzhi nAn
AyanukkAght[tAn kaNDak-kanA vinai vEyar pugazh villiputtUr kOn kOdai shol 
tUya tamizh mAlai Iraindum vallavar vAyum nan makkaLai peTru magizhvarE
